dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form

Class AbstractTreeTableRowValueConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.ValueConverter
      • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.AbstractTreeTableRowValueConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Comparator<java.lang.String>

    public class AbstractTreeTableRowValueConverter
extends ValueConverter
    This is a row aware implementation of a ValueConverter.

    If a column of a SWTTreeTable uses this implementation the tree table calls doConvertToData(Object, String), doConvertToView(Object, String) and doVerifyValue(Object, String, String) instead of the methods without row information.

    BooleanValueConverter, IntegerValueConverter, FloatValueConverter can be used for delgation of the conversion.

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    11

      • doSupportsSeparator

        public boolean doSupportsSeparator(java.lang.Object rowObject)
        Query if this ValueConverter is capable of showing separators when converting to view.

        This method may be overridden. The default implementation calls doSupportsSeparator().

        Parameters:
        rowObject - The row object that represents the row (returned by SWTTreeTableController.doGetRowObject(Object, int))
        Since:
        11
        See Also:

      • doVerifyValue

        public boolean doVerifyValue(java.lang.Object rowObject,
                             java.lang.String original,
                             java.lang.String value)
        Verifies the value during user input.

        This method may be overridden. This default implementation calls doVerifyValue(String, String).

        Parameters:
        rowObject - The row object that represents the row (returned by SWTTreeTableController.doGetRowObject(Object, int))
        original - the last value
        value - the new value
        Since:
        11
        See Also:
